item.title: Trump Revokes Security Clearances for Biden, Harris, Clinton and More
item.description: The tally of names read like President Trump’s enemies list, from Letitia James to Liz Cheney.

item.title: Inside the Turmoil at the V.A. Mental Health System Under Trump
item.description: A chaotic restructuring ordered threatens to degrade services for veterans of wars in Vietnam, Iraq and Afghanistan.

item.title: The Nonprofit Caught in the Fray of Trump’s Attacks on Big Law
item.description: A federal inquiry into D.E.I. practices at 20 law firms zeroed in on SEO, a decades-old program that helps students land jobs on Wall Street.

item.title: George Foreman, Boxing Champion and Grilling Magnate, Dies at 76
item.description: He claimed a world title in his 20s and again in his 40s, and then made millions selling grills.

item.title: Decades Ago, Columbia Refused to Pay Trump $400 Million
item.description: A quarter century ago, the university was looking to expand. It considered, and rejected, property owned by Donald Trump. He did not forget it.
